Review.Titre: closed my account for no reason
Review.Contenu: My PIN did not go through and I called them and they said they need to verify if the last number I tried to call was from a family or friend or for business I told them the number was from a friend but they  didn't believe it but asked if it was a family or a friend, I said friend, they said that they have to close my account because they see that someone with the same last name as mine also called the number and they know that I say Not the truthAnd the 1 star I give is because they at least gave me my money back

Review.Titre: Unable to activate credits to my account
Review.Contenu: After 3 years of great service I tried to add some additional time to my account. Despite polite and prompt responses (an email chain of 7 emails) from RingBritain customer support they were unable to work with my telco provider (Fido in Canada) to apply the credit amount.  I also spoke with Fido who had no knowledge of RingBritain and therefore could not help.  Unfortunately RingBritain are not willing to refund my credit card payment made to them either.

Review.Titre: Calls keep dropping when in a wifi mesh…
Review.Contenu: Calls keep dropping when in a wifi mesh environment.  Feels like it cannot handle switching from wifi point to wifi point even though coverage is continuous.

Review.Titre: Usually the service is excellent but I…
Review.Contenu: Usually the service is excellent but I had an irritating situation. I was in deep discussion with a very dear old friend and RingBritain stopped it with a message of this number is not a working number or something like that and then off! I have to deal with organizations for my retirement so this could be a true headache!

Review.Titre: your services do not work properly the…
Review.Contenu: your services do not work properly the access number you gave me never works.. I don't know what I'm paying for....

Review.Titre: The lack any customer service is very…
Review.Contenu: The lack any customer service is very frustrating. There is no phone or email to address problems.
*  It doesn't let me enter my number to register.*  My speed dials don't work. It says 'not enough credit'.I am very not happy with it.

Review.Titre: Often when I use the account to call…
Review.Contenu: Often when I use the account to call abroad then a foreign person answers and it is very frustrating

Review.Titre: ring britain doesnt seem to allow me to…
Review.Contenu: ring britain doesnt seem to allow me to call mobiles abroad. Please can you help me asapThanks!

Review.Titre: Could never get the calling card to…
Review.Contenu: Could never get the calling card to work from USA to UK
Doesn't work, impossible to cancel

Review.Titre: I tried on several occasions last week…
Review.Contenu: I tried on several occasions last week to reach my brother who lives in London. After several failed attempts to use RingBritain's system, I wrote to you looking for help.No response was received from your firm.I will continue to be a subscriber, and hope that you will eventually offer some advice.

I recently started using "Ring Britain" again as it had been a good service in the past. I have an issue that when I call my access number my smart phone says I am "calling Kenya". This makes me nervous as I do not know if I will be charged correctly.  I have messaged customer service twice and no one responded.

Poor quality horrible support send survey with ad to buy more don't care at all about the customer after reading my review ring Britain decided to punish me and make the connection far worse so to make my service returned to bad I withdraw my comments hopefully this will allow the service to go back to barely useable

Review.Titre: There is not an option for zero stars …
Review.Contenu: There is not an option for zero stars so I gave it one.there is a delay in the call so you are five seconds behind when you talk. Sometimes the call goes into a repeat mode so you aren't able to speak live you suddenly hear the party in England repeating over and over. Wish an alternative was available.

Despite several letters that I sent to your firm, complaining about the inability to use your 'phone service. you now have the audacity your my experience ask for my opinion. How you stay in business is a mystery to me.John Schueler

Calls from Australia to a mobile in South Africa. Initially charged at advertised rate of 6.9 cents/min for first year of using RingBritain. Last $30.00 I was charged at 49.9 cents/min (over 3 times what I would have been charged using my normal provider). When contacted they told me this was the charge by the MTN provider in South Africa and that I had always been charged this rate. Laughing at the "help" person on the other end didn't get this issue solved. I will definitely NEVER use RingBritain again !!!!!!!!!

Review.Titre: Love the fact that I can talk to my…
Review.Contenu: Love the fact that I can talk to my friends and family in UK at such a reasonable rate at any time and with no time restrictions. I do wish they had a good deal for calling cell/mobile phones as many people today do not have landlines.

Review.Titre: i find the quality of the line very…
Review.Contenu: i find the quality of the line very poor most of the time. I am using this service to phone clients on mobile uk numbers and often they cannot hear me and at times i have to resort to costly calls from my own mobile. The charges are inexpensive but the line is terrible. I ask myself why I have not tried to find a better service (line quality wise) all the time. My colleagues who use this service say exactly the same thing so it is not any settings that are the problem as far as I can see. Also the line comes up looking like I am calling from the US so some people do not trust this and don't answer these calls
web calling doesn't work. would be better if option didn't require some special pc requirements but would be widely and easily accessible on any laptop
Very bad connection. Takes too long to connect. The other person keeps hearing their own voice and the voice is distorting.

Review.Titre: Ring Britain.com was exactly what I…
Review.Contenu: Ring Britain.com was exactly what I wanted and I have not been disappointed
STOP SENDING ME EMAILS...... EVEN AFTER UNSUBCRIBING
Having lots of issues.  Calls keep dropping.  Useless
I find that the line is always poor to England.

Review.Titre: Horrible service condescending arrogant belittling those were there best qualities
Review.Contenu: Think the title said it all rude.

Review.Titre: too much information and unable to use…
Review.Contenu: too much information and unable to use the system

Review.Titre: I cannot get through on ring Britain
Review.Contenu: I have used ring Britain successfully for some years, and always found it very good. Of late, however, for past few weeks,  I cannot get through to the mobile numbers I usually call. Very frustrating.

I've used this app for a while now. I would have given it 4 stars before but I've recently been having issues with the microphones just stopping to work mid-conversation (I have to toggle between between the microphone to temporarily solve the issue, but it keeps reappearing multiple times in conversations). Calls also just drop unexpectedly. I've tried not using a VPN, I make sure I get a powerful and clean wifi signal, but the calls keep dropping randomly. I'm giving this app a chance for a few more weeks because it served me so well in the past, but I don't intend on putting up with bugs for much longer than that.

After receiving a strong recommendation from a close relative who uses RingBritian, I spent days! trying to raise the website to register. I even had other professional MAC users try. We changed browsers.There did not seem to be any way to contact  a person to deal with the problem. I'm still unsure how to place a call form a phone not my own.

Review.Titre: Had to reconnect to my brother 3 times…
Review.Contenu: Had to reconnect to my brother 3 times during one conversation, I got cut off so often.

Review.Titre: I just want to make sure I can now call…
Review.Contenu: I just want to make sure I can now call Canada from the UK with RingBritain.I have not been able to get any response from a representative on that.  I went ahead and added money to do so, but I dont know if when I call Canada, I am paying 2 pence or 40 pence.
3 times during our call my father-in-law could hear us and we could not hear him so we had to call back several times.  Annoying…..
the line frequently don't workotherwise great service

Review.Titre: Calls made via Ring Britain to certain…
Review.Contenu: Calls made via Ring Britain to certain UK switchboards cannot get through - always get message that they are engaged but they are not. An immediate call from a different phone not using Ring Britain always gets through. This has been reported to Ring Britain but no response.

Review.Titre: Do not follow through with bonus credits promised
Review.Contenu: Topped up $20  and applied code given for easter and should have got $3 bonus time but did not. So asked for it to be applied - they would not so asked them to refund $15 but refunded whole amount. It is not the first time they have made out they have a deal on and then not given credit promised

RingBritain has the irritating feature that it cuts you off when your balance is getting low and demands that you put more money in before you can use the service.  So with several hundred minutes in my account and not having access to make a top up payment I was left stranded.  Something completely unnecessary driven by a desire to get the customer's money in a bit quicker - it spoils an otherwise good service with a good website

Review.Titre: My phone company decided to make the…
Review.Contenu: My phone company decided to make the local access numbers premium without publishing the change and I have been charged rather a large amount of money. This is new. Have changed to 900.... number and although you pay 4 cents a minute, it's much cheaper than paying the rent phone service provider.

I would have given you zero stars if I could, except that your staff member was not rude (as per your description of 1 star).Your staff member did not answer my question, but I assume that it has been closed, otherwise I wouldn't have got this survey.Because you haven't answered my question, it still looks to me that you will steal my money.Trustpilot: the "Terms & Conditions" and "Privacy Policy" links below need scroll bars on the windows which open. They are probably legally meaningless the way they are now.

Review.Titre: Have used ring Britain for the last…
Review.Contenu: Have used ring Britain for the last couple of years or so to ring the UK from Ireland. On the whole it has been quite good. But in the last few months the call quality has been poor with a 2 to 3 second time delay. Time to find a different supplier now I think.

Used to be excellent. After I plunked down $50, call quality sucks. Really has gone downhill. What happens if a few minutes into the call one side or the other goes silent. Have to call back, 3-4 minutes into it, silence on one end.

Review.Titre: I have a lot of problems with the line …
Review.Contenu: I have a lot of problems with the line when I ring mobile numbers. 50% of the time, the line breaks up and I am probably going to change providers unless this improves. Has been the same for 18 months now so may have to vote with my feet !

Review.Titre: My 2 credits cards  would not go…
Review.Contenu: My 2 credits cards  would not go through on line, old card out of date, had to ring your help line to get it sorted, both cards are OK, should beeaser to change a credit card.

Review.Titre: Terrible call quality using the app
Review.Contenu: Terrible call quality using the app. Long periods of dead air. They don't care about this. I've been using RingBritain for years and it's getting worse.
They state that you only get charged when the call is answered but YOU GET CHARGED ON CONNECTION.

Review.Titre: Some calls have a lot of interference …
Review.Contenu: Some calls have a lot of interference on the line and drop for no reason
noisy chappy and gargling. it used to be better.
The numbers come up in England as numbers from Honlolulu etc. and the receiver does not know whose calling or who to call back.
It wasn't easy to update expiration date on my credit card. No customer service phone number. After several days of trying I finally was able to do it.Love RingBritain. Good for 5 years.Yeah!
Sometimes the connection is fine, and sometimes there is an echo, or even the person cannot hear me, and I have to call again.

Review.Titre: Well to be honest at the begining it…
Review.Contenu: Well to be honest at the begining it was great but past week or 2 at least!, it has been playing up and cant seem to call abroad easilly!!Please help me!

Review.Titre: You sent me a $2.00 coupon to use by…
Review.Contenu: You sent me a $2.00 coupon to use by Dec (6th?) if placed a $15.00 minimum order.   I tried to do this with the coupon code and the lowest it would allow me to buy was $25.00 amount.   This felt like a scam.Bob Smith

Review.Titre: When an urgent help is required
Review.Contenu: When an urgent help is required, it is not there. A live chat will be very helpful.

Review.Titre: I once called customer service to ask…
Review.Contenu: I once called customer service to ask whether the length of calls was limited, and was told that they were not. However, my experience has been different. After an hour or so -- once it was only 5 minutes -- my calls are often terminated by an auto voice saying, "The number you have dialed is incorrect. Please enter the number you wish to call." I would appreciate an explanation of why the auto voice keeps cutting me off. Apart from this annoying feature, Ring Britain is an excellent deal!Derek Dalton

My wife uses your service to call home.  Overall it is a good service, however, there have been times where she has had to call over and over to get access to the overseas area she calls.  This combined with the occasional less than quality line she expects to get is the reason for the rating.

My experience with ring britain is now becoming tiresome. After my first problem when I had to start entering a code to enable me to place a call and contacting you and that being solved, this week my credit card disappears and my automatic renewal does as well thus stopping me from making calls. Your agent tho' being polite did not understand me to well and could not get the fact that I have been with you for a considerable amount of time with a credit card on file and automatic renewal 2 strikes so far in three weeks

At times it is very good value for money, but at times after getting through to Ring Britain and inputing my required number, it starts ringing then stops and I am asked to dial the number I require...can happen about three times and then I am told "goodby" and then cut off.

Review.Titre: The calls from USA to UK keep dropping…
Review.Contenu: The calls from USA to UK keep dropping the sound or the call dropped completely. Price is not bad but quality of the app is poor and unstable. The sound when working well is good but in one conversation the sound can drop several times.

Review.Titre: The line I had was very poor
Review.Contenu: The line I had was very poor. Spent over an hour on the fone to my bank and it was such hard work. Did try to call back and get another line. No better. However. I have used ring Britain for years and this is the first bad line.

booked through a 3rd party charging 20% commission, while thinking I had booked online direct with the taxi firm. No way to get back to them to cancel transaction.  Paid 95 GBPs therefore instead of 80 GBPs. Beware this scam.

Review.Titre: App needs fixing but call number is good.
Review.Contenu: The app is crap and the calls never connect. Or drop out after only a few seconds. When you call up on the ringbritian number then dial that way, it works great. So if they just fix the app it would be 6 stars.

RingBritain is great, when it works right.  Lately I've been getting a message which says, "You do not have enough credits" when I try to make a call.  The problem is that I am on a monthly plan that automatically renews, so "enough credits" should never be a problem.  Sometimes it doesn't tell me I don't have enough credits, but instead said I dialed a non-working number.  I hope they get these problems resolved.EDIT:  After reading the response from RingBritain, I just want to say that they are incorrect.  I was calling a number in England and I was using the correct codes.  It is about the only number I call and know for a fact that I dialed correctly.  They still have a problem on their end that needs to be resolved.  Once that has been taken care of, I would say they deserve 5 stars!

Review.Titre: Most times it works and few times it is as bad as it gets...
Review.Contenu: Most times the call quality is good. Sometimes it gets bad for a period of time how many ever time I try. After a few minutes it will work well again.

Review.Titre: Love the price but cumbersome process
Review.Contenu: Love the price. From a land line I don’t  like having to dial a number, enter a code, and then enter the number you’re calling.
A good service in general but often i find the signal not as clear as it is on whatsapp which is free.

Review.Titre: The calls break up and hard to hear
Works well and great value no customer support
Review.Contenu: Works well and great value. Customer service poor never reply to questions or issues.

Review.Titre: I am being charged for UNANSWERED CALLS…
Review.Contenu: I am being charged for UNANSWERED CALLS for whatever reason!!!!

Review.Titre: Very cheap and convenient but reception …
Review.Contenu: Very cheap and convenient but reception poor at times

Review.Titre: Very helpful young lady who was very…
Review.Contenu: Very helpful young lady who was very patient getting issue rectified. Thanks.

Review.Titre: The app is easily installed, BUT...
Review.Contenu: The app is easily installed, the rates are very good and easy to top up via PayPal. The only problem is an occasional occurrence -sometimes when I phone someone  they can't hear my voice. Not faint, totally absent. And this persists for a while through repeated re-dialings. Sometimes my efforts are angrily mistaken for repeated crank calls.  On those occasions I then have to redial via Messenger or a similar platform, but this only works if the person to whom I wish to speak is on Facebook. Or WhatsApp.

No problems whatsoever adding money; occasionally however after the number is dialed it will ring once or twice and then go silent. This necessitates dialing again and hoping that the call will go through this time. Nevertheless, because the rates are so good, a bit of inconvenience is excusable.

Review.Titre: Have been using this service for years…
Review.Contenu: Have been using this service for years and have had a great experience. Low cost even when you call from your cell phone. I wish there wasn't a time limit or it would give an option to extend your time rather than cutting you off abruptly.

Review.Titre: I am very happy with your phone service…
Review.Contenu: I am very happy with your phone service tothe UK. I was tired of being overcharged by my phone company for long distance calling and more so with overseas calls.Thanks again for your option to call Britain we are retirees and enjoy your phone service for overseas calling. Andrew.

I have used RingBritain for a number of years, 10ish I think, and it has been excellent.  The only issue I have had is in the last week, when I was in a call with the UK and got a warning about low credit. 20 seconds later, without a chance to talk to the person I was speaking to, my call was dropped. Since it was a call center that I had waited 25mins to connect to I was a little perturbed!!  Other than that faultless. I topped up the credit and continue to use, just keep an eye on your credit.....
Great! but I can't find a help center to chat with a human, or to send any inquire to a human.also we need a local Belgium number to use the calling card.
usually good ring britian must make sure that the system always works which is not the case, it,s sometimes a bit on and off

Review.Titre: Great value for money and good quality…
Review.Contenu: Great value for money and good quality calls.My only complaint is that sometimes the sound disappears, but once I call back it is restored.

Review.Titre: I have been a customer for the past…
Review.Contenu: I have been a customer for the past year and call the UK 3-4 times a week. I am very happy with this service. I haven’t experienced any problems. Great way to stay connected to family in the UK at a very cheap rate.

Review.Titre: Unfortunately every time I try to call…
Review.Contenu: Unfortunately every time I try to call a 0800 number in the UK it never works.

Review.Titre: Dropped 1 star because it does depend…
Review.Contenu: Dropped 1 star because it does depend on internet signal, which sometimes isn't strong enough to make call.

Very happy with the service which I use to call home from Florida once or twice a week.  My only gripe is that the line drops off and I have to redial at around the 23 minute mark every time I use it.

Review.Titre: The extra bonus incentive is a good deal.
Review.Contenu: The extra bonus incentive is a good deal. Low price and good connection from US to Europe.Thank you.
Overall great service. Occasional drop outs but mostly clear audio
Some passing connection problems, but, hey, whats perfect ?

Review.Titre: Mostly excellent but I have had a few…
Review.Contenu: Mostly excellent but I have had a few dropped calls where I have had to call back.

Review.Titre: Phone app not working properly even…
Review.Contenu: Phone app not working properly even after deleting and reinstalling

Review.Titre: Calls drop from time to time
Review.Contenu: Calls drop from time to time. Generally very good value for money.

Review.Titre: I have been using Ring Britain for a…
Review.Contenu: I have been using Ring Britain for a couple of years but recently in the middle of my call the lady interrupts and  says, " if you would like to make a call please dial the Number"  I then have to go through the entire dialing process again, only to find out that the party I am calling cannot hear me.  other than that I have been happy with it.

You get the occasional call that doesn't connect but you get UNLIMITED calls to UK mobiles and landlines for a fiver a month, thats about 10 minutes on your normal mobile phone. Call quality is fine I use the phone number and speed dials you can use an app but I hate apps, calls on things like whatsapp and facebook sounds like you're talking to Norman Collie. You can get a couple of hours to the UK for two yoyos so its cheap to try.

Review.Titre: Renewal of Credit Card used for my monthly payments
Review.Contenu: On the whole we enjoy work with RingBritain.However, recently the credit card used for my monthly automatic payments reached its expiry date. So I got a new card with a different expiry date!This set off complications with both RingBritain and my bank - which, in turn, led to hours of my time spent on the phone to sort out.It would have been easier if RingBritain had just called me - or had a phone number where I could speak to them.

Review.Titre: Great Service for Inexpensive Phone Calls to Britain
Review.Contenu: Have been a user of RingBritain for years.  Recently we were faced with a need to expand our usage of this service.  It is easy to enable, easy to add money to the available balance (either pay-as-you-go or monthly) and easy to add users to the account.  Website is a little tricky to navigate the website, but otherwise the service is very good.  Rates are inexpensive as well. Recommend this service.

Review.Titre: An excellent service at an excellent…
Review.Contenu: An excellent service at an excellent price. My only problem is that the calls are routed by various circuitous means and don't indicate they're from me on Call Display, but rather that they originate from some exotic foreign clime instead. Therefore, sometimes friends or businesses abroad think some unknown person from Korea or wherever is phoning and don't answer. I hope this can be addressed and fixed soon.

Review.Titre: We use the service to keep in contact…
Review.Contenu: We use the service to keep in contact with our family.On the whole, we find the service very good. The thing that we don't like is that we seem to get cut off after about 30 mins conversation - and we're not sure why that has to be.When it happens, we have to redial the whole number again.

This service works perfectly from Ireland. The only complaint I have is that you don't have time on a mobile to put the number in. So you "ring Britain" then you have to flip back between your contacts and the ring Britain screen to type the number in. You don't have a long enough pause in the software and before you've finished typing it it says "the number you have dialled is incorrect" so it becomes liek a race to get the number in. Give us more time to type the number in !!!!!!! And yes I'm aware of the app but I don't always have internet.

Things seem fine now, but initially we couldn't make any calls for the first month and yet we were charged the monthly fee.  We couldn't understand the procedure of phoning a Wellington number first and then our overseas number after that.As I've mentioned - things are fine now, now that we understand the procedures properly.

Review.Titre: The service is excellent except in one …
Review.Contenu: The service is excellent except in one way. When I no longer needed the service, I had difficulty canceling the contract and the automatic recharging from my credit card. This was particularly disturbing because I remember not checking the box "automatic recharge" at the time of setting up my account. It is a shame because the service is perfect in every other way.

So, the only reason there are four instead of five stars is . . . . Seems when i call into the EU (now that the UK is out) the number that shows up as the caller is pretty random as to the country of call origination.Imagine it has something to do with the routing.t.

I love this service, it's easy to use functions well and works out cheap for me. I enjoy the fact that I can use it across multiple devices and easily keep check of the cost of each call. I would recommend this service. The only reason I haven't given it 5 stars is because on a few occasions the reception hasn't been good. If they can sort that out it would be a total winner for me.

Review.Titre: Great price for calls, great quality of calls.
Review.Contenu: Have used RingBritain for 4 or 5 years now during our 6 month winter stay in Florida. Besides calling the UK regularly we also call Spain, Poland and Australia. Very rarely is there a problem making a connection. Very rarely is the call quality other than excellent. We use auto top-up which makes sure we always have credit,  and opt to be told prior to each call how much credit remains. Highly recommend! The call rates are unbelievably low.

Review.Titre: Not always able to get through.
Review.Contenu: I have had several times, we could not get through and my wife ended up calling the very expensive route of direct.  She finds it difficult do dial  and enter the pass code before she even gets to the main number.  I need to always remind her the savings is worth the effort.

I have been using Ring Britain for a couple of years now.  Its easy to use, easy top up, simple on-line account and a cheap way ot staying in touch with family and friends.  The only reason I didn't give it 5, is occasionally (not often), the line can be a little poor quality. Not sure if that is their fault though.

Your service is fine. My only complaint is the annoying, intrusive reminder about pressing the star key to add more credit every time I connect with RingBritain.  I don't need it, especially when I've just topped up my account.Is there a way to disable it?

Generally the service and information is pretty clear. The quality of the call is not as clear as I would like it to be but it can be managed. I have problems with the webcall service. I have never been able to use it. Does anybody else have that problem too? The information on that is pretty vague.

Review.Titre: Good calling system, but top up costs a little misleading
Review.Contenu: I put $20 on my account in Australia but had actually been charged $27.28 when I checked my bank account. Presumably this is because Ring Britain is based in the USA, but I think the currency conversion should be clearly stated on the purchasing page so that customers pay the amount they would like to pay rather than almost $8 more on top!! The actual call system is easy to use and I have never had any problems, but I may consider using a company based in Australia when I need to top up in future so that $20 is actually $20.

Generally excellent and I love that you can program in your PIN based on your phone #. However I HATE that if I program in the PIN for UK I can not use the PIN I have for Australia. If I want to call both places on the one phone I have to enter PINs EVERY call.....

I find it very easy to use in conjunction with speed dial. My only frustration has been that the access numbers occasionally don't work, I have added three to my phonebook and this makes it easier, in case one access number doesn't work. Incredibly inexpensive to use.

Good enough service so far, thank you. I say 'so far', as an alternative provider started out fine then slipped badly, also in non-responsive customer service, which was the main reason I switched to RingBritain.

Review.Titre: Great clarity and ease of calling
Review.Contenu: Great clarity and ease of calling. I have been charged 3 times as seen on my bank statement.  Emailed ring tones Received response asap and was told I had only been charged once from their end. Will try to contact you today. great price for sure.

I really like this app. It's a fast quick connection. I's cheap The only neg. thing is on every call I make to england there is a block during the call, having said this the service has improved since I started using it.

Review.Titre: Price of calls first rate.I have a bit …
Review.Contenu: Price of calls first rate.I have a bit of a problem with dropped calls but I think it may be because I have an internet phone system and it is perhaps a fault of the internet provider,otherwise I thoroughly recommend Ring Britain.

Review.Titre: We use this service every week and find…
Review.Contenu: We use this service every week and find it very valuable. The only issue I have is that we usually get cut off after talking for an hour. If we're not finishedd speaking with family, we have to call them back.

Excellent. Very cheap, easy to set up and use. The speed dial options and being able to allow calls from certain numbers without using a PIN means that you can basically forget about typing PINs and complicated codes, and the auto-top-up option means you never have to worry about money, so once you set it up you can basically forget about it.The voice quality is usually excellent too. The only thing that stops me giving the full 5 stars is that sometimes I get a bit of annoying echo on the line - although this may be down to the landline at home and nothing to do with RingBritain.Overall very happy, I have been using the service for years with no hassle.

Have been using this site for several years. Easy to navigate, very cheap to UK....extremely happy with the service. On occasion I do get an echo back, but not often enough to have made a complaint. All in all a really good find!

Review.Titre: Cant beat the price for calls to the…
Review.Contenu: Cant beat the price for calls to the UK. My only complaint is that every second or third call will have either an echo or horrendous crackling on the line. I hang up and redial which sometimes fixes the problem.
For the most part your service is good.  There have been times I have not been able to get through or had to call back due to a bad line. These are the exception and not the rule.
I use RingBritain to call the UK from Australia - it's simple to use, great prices, and I don't think that I've ever had any issues with the connection (currently two years of using the service).
Sometimes calls cut out after an hour or there is crackly on the line. But apart from that the service is great. I like that your credit is available immediately after it's been added.
Great, cheap way to call home. Have had occasional issues calling lo-call numbers that the RingBritain switchboard hasn't connected me to, possibly deprecated numbers though.
The price is great, the reason I’ve given 4 Stars is because occasionally the sound quality isn’t good.Although I can hear the person I’m talking to, they tell me it’s not loud enough.
The number connects quickly, quality is very good to UK mobiles, I cannot figure out the speed dial however thats a minor irritation. The calls are quite cheap. You can't buy €2.00 credit any more
Always had good service from you. However clarification on costs when ringing 800 numbers could be made clearer because they are so expensive compared with other UK numbers.  Overall very satisfied.

Review.Titre: Sometimes I get disconnected or call is…using the service for years
Review.Contenu: Sometimes I get disconnected or call is dropped. I was also getting awful feedback when talking . They could not resolved that problem. Otherwise to order minutes is very easy. Price is ok .
Some snags initially with the connector but I was very impressed by Ring Britain's response to my problem and setting it up for me so all went smoothly. Excellent service.
thanks to Ring Britain I am able to keep in touch with my ex and hopefully reignite our relationship good service excellent price and available at all times thank you ringbritain
Since discovering RingBritain, I have not looked back. The price is excellent. The calls do get dropped occasionally, but not so much to outweigh the rest of the service.

Review.Titre: Generally the service has been really…
Review.Contenu: Generally the service has been really good, but in the last two weeks I have had two dropped calls - i.e. I was talking and was abruptly cut off.
Had to phone a few times as it would not connect and quality of call was very bad on several occasions but after redialling was much clearer
Great site, but if you falter when inputting the number you want, you get kicked out of the system, which is pretty annoying. But other than that all good

Review.Titre: It can't get better than that.
Ring Britain is a good  service that…
Review.Contenu: Ring Britain is a good  service that allows me to stay in touch with people I love in Britain.  It's clear and easy to use for the most part.
Easy to use but starting to have connection problems when calling a UK mobile...if it doesnt improve then will have to find an alternative.
Great value service. Just dropped a star because you do need a strong cell signal. Sometimes flags signal poor cannot connect.

Review.Titre: Lately it seems that some calls are…
Review.Contenu: Lately it seems that some calls are lost mid call, and I have to call back. Is this my phone, or the connection? I don't know.
On the whole I have had  very good experiences but sometimes I get disconnected after a few minutes causing me to have to have to re dial.
Sometimes get interference on the line, probably nothing to do with RingBritian.  Ok credit seems to last, easy to top up

Review.Titre: I did have a problem when I got…
Review.Contenu: I did have a problem when I got started, but with help from the customer service this was resolved and I have had not problem since.

Review.Titre: RingBritain is really good value for call Mobiles in other countries.
Review.Contenu: RingBritain is really good value for ring Mobiles in other countries.  Sometimes they system does not work which can be frustrating.

Review.Titre: no problem buying extra time on your …
Review.Contenu: no problem buying extra time on your system.I was hoping for a special deal but did not happen in the time frame I needed.T
Generally great connection at a good price. Occasionally get disconnected or will not connect. Love the special bonuses!
Initial difficulty in attempting to download the website.Managed to get phone contact and the service was excellent.
excellent ratesonly issue there should be a 2 minute warning (you have 2 minutes left) so one can end call properly

Review.Titre: Just a bit annoying to be reminded how…
Review.Contenu: Just a bit annoying to be reminded how to top up credit when what I want is to speak to my family!!Otherwise good.
Fair pricing. Uncomplicated. Would like to be able to do two or more calls without "signing" in each time.
OK, not costing a lot, however if calling from a Cell phone often drops out, especially if not going through wifi.
Sometimes it does not connect and i get 'Please enter the number you require' again a little annoying,
Service is too quick to announce call # wrong while I am still looking up the end of a number.   Not patient enough.

Review.Titre: I always use Ring Britain and rarely…
Review.Contenu: I always use Ring Britain and rarely have a problem.  The line is usually clear and I love the speed dialing.
Could not give 5 unfortunately as sometimes the line is unclear & also occasionally have been cut off.

Review.Titre: Sometimes UK number is not accepted or…
Review.Contenu: Sometimes UK number is not accepted or not recognised. This may not be the fault of Ring Britain.
Great service and fantastic prices, though the line is often poor and breaks up.  Been using a few years now.
Bargain price. About 30% of the time I get a very poor connection & have to hang up & start again

Review.Titre: Love Ring Britain  but it disconnected …
Review.Contenu: Love Ring Britain  but it disconnected me when I still had money available, even though it s pretty low.
Generally excellent, but recently I was told to add money, getting cut off, when I still had .78c.

Review.Titre: mostly good but my automaic top up was…
Review.Contenu: mostly good but my automaic top up was deleted and a great deal o work needed to restore his.
Didn't give a "five"star because sometimes you need to call back when lines are not busy.
Calls get dropped at 59.59 minutes, every time.  Cant go wrong for the price.  Great customer service.
Good value for money handy when u can't use the free ones!!  Usually no problems with charity.
Easy to buy more time, and easy to use.
It'd be good if you didn't have to hang up and redial if calling more than one number.
Very good service, technically speaking, at a very reasonable price. Highly recommended!
Most times able to connect, clear line.  Great to keep in touch with friends and family.
Clear calls. Credit card was hacked right after purchasing minutes from your website.

Review.Titre: It would have been 5 stars but for the…
Review.Contenu: It would have been 5 stars but for the last 2 days I have been unable to ring the uk

Review.Titre: This service makes it very reasonable
Review.Contenu: This service makes it very reasonable to maintain contact with my English family.
So far so good, very helpful quick reply to my emails so far all goodTony Sugarman
Super simple to use. Saves a lot on overseas calls. Pre program your most used numbers and simply hit that digit when you connect.
Great lines and rapid connection, a lifeline for me and my Mum.

Review.Titre: Actually Ring Britain has always been…
Review.Contenu: Actually Ring Britain has always been great.  However from 1st November they are changing the way they operate.  They will no longer be allowing calls from landlines, instead, we are encouraged to use the app on mobiles instead.  Really not convenient for our particular set up, very disappointed in this decision.

Been hooked up with Ring Britain since 2017 when I reconnected with an old flame in the Liverpool area.  We are able to keep in touch as much as we want using not only my RingBritian over here in the US but through the virtual number I got for him to use over in the UK.  Now RingBritian is offering a special non-roaming item which I will check into before our next overseas trip.
Always a good reception, voice is crystal clear. Highly recommend…..thank you, RingBritain.com

Review.Titre: It has been a lifesaver to me being…stops me being homesick
Review.Contenu: It has been a lifesaver to me being able to phone my family everyday!

Review.Titre: It is so easy to use
Review.Contenu: It is so easy to use.   Love talking to my brother in London without worry of the cost.

It is a very good service , Quick and easy to sign up , and very cost effective.  It's the best I've come across and there are  no hassles joining and closing, unlike other services. Could not find a better or easier service.

Excellent audio quality in call. No dropped conversation. I am 80 and don't think very fast, and my fingers are not nimble anymore. I find the 'voice of the operator' does not allow enough time for me to enter the number I'm trying to reach which consists of 01144114234xxxx, By the time I've looked it up  (too long to remember) the voice operator has wished me 'goodbye'
Like. Easy to make overseas calls with numbered person calling. No fiddling with getting correct phone number with the saved person numbers.  THANKS

Review.Titre: I’ve been using RingBritain for about 3…
Review.Contenu: I’ve been using RingBritain for about 3 months and am very happy with their service. My family in England tell me that they can hear so much better with this service and there are no pauses and a very clear line. I would most certainly recommend RingBritain to anyone that needs inexpensive and good calls to England.

Review.Titre: I have enjoyed the services of Ring…
Review.Contenu: I have enjoyed the services of Ring Britain for many years and really appreciate the low rates and easy access. Easy website and other means for refilling one's credit also helps, and Ring Britain also accepts calls to other countries at low rates. Thank you for the service.

I appreciate my RingBritain membership very much.  It keeps me in touch with family and friends in the United Kingdom.  It is very reasonably-priced and would cost me a lot more if I tried to use other methods.  Thank you, RingBritain for providing this service, not only to U.K. nationals but also to our many friends here in the United States.  Sincerely, Judith York

Review.Titre: Could not live without Ring Britain
Review.Contenu: I have been using Ring Britain now for over 4 years.  My guy is in Liverpool, UK, I am here in Florida.  I purchased a virtual number for him and I use the standard Ring Britain service.  We have been separated for over one year because of the travel ban so needless to say Ring Britain has proved to be a godsend for us.

Review.Titre: I have been using the Ring Britain…
Review.Contenu: I have been using the Ring Britain phone card for about 4 years now and it has never let me down. Excellent service and every penny is worth it. I always recommend Ring Britain to all my friends, especially those are originally from the United Kingdom and now residing in the U.S.

I added an amount to my deposit.  It was a very simple procedure and I appreciated the ease which their design program helped me do it quickly and efficiently. Well done RingBritain, I will be a customer for many more years and the convenient local number phone service is great!

It is so easy to use, good quality of connection, easy to recharge, you are always aware of amount of money left and the time you have left to talk. I use RingBritain for many years.Absolutely recommended

RingBritain I am impressed that you responded to my comment on no longer being able to connect to Britain on the landline and  I do have a private number. Your reply and caring about your customers in such a way deserves 10 stars. RingBritain is great when using from my mobile, and I certainly have no complaints on that front.  However, when using the landline I am no longer able to make any connections to Britain. Do not know what is going on there as initially I could use both.  The website is user friendly, it is easy to access my account and to make changes and add more time etc.  The cost is really fantastic for contacting with all the family and friends back in Britain that are not yet on the internet. Thank you RingBritain.
I dial the local number. When prompted enter the code I have assigned to a number I call on a regular basis. Call goes through. What more could a caller want? Thank you.
Excellent service. I have elderley relatives in UK who have no internet and only landlines.Never had any problems with connection. Amazing value, wish I had found you years ago.

Review.Titre: Got on my lap top to make a payment.
Review.Contenu: Got on my lap top to make a payment to my account and realized I had forgotten my passward.  Made it known and you immediately e-mailed me a link whichennabled me to make new passward.  This then allowed me to make payment.. All very fast and efficient.  Thank you.

Review.Titre: Am using the monthly unlimited service…
Review.Contenu: Am using the monthly unlimited service and it has been great to contact cousins.  At two hours it cuts you off and have to redial.  A little annoying but can live with it.   Connections are crystal clear.

Top marks to RingBritain.com!  It enables me to talk to my family and friends in Britain.   It keeps me connected and feeling secure knowing that I canafford to keep chatting whenever I feel the needkeep up with them.  Thank you for a very valuableservice.  Sincerely, Judith York

Review.Titre: A generally very reliable service with…
Review.Contenu: A generally very reliable service with clear messages as to number of minutes left. In all my time using the service I think it has only been collapsed on all access numbers once. The payment plans and service is simple and also works well. I'm very happy with the service.

Review.Titre: I've used Ring Britan for a few years…
Review.Contenu: I've used Ring Britan for a few years without any problems. I started using it when I was in the US. I then moved to the UK and continue to use it when I travel out of the country in order to contact those back in the UK without expensive cellphone plans. The calls also are clearer and no call drops.

Review.Titre: Good and clear service with no issues. Thanks.
Review.Contenu: Always a good and clear connection and the monthly charges are very reasonable compared to what my network would charge for long distance calls. No comparison at all so thanks for your service and I appreciate it.

Great service, Easy to set up and connect.No hidden fees.I keep in touch with family in U K and this service has saved me money plus being able to stay in touch on a regular basis without going bankrupt.

I have had a RingBritain number in order to call my guy in UK since August 2017.  I had a virtual number also for him to call me here in the US.  Other than when he was not in the UK for 10 mos.  I had the same virtual #.  I cancelled and re-upped when he is now back in UK (new # but who cares right).  We really thank our lucky stars we found RingBritain so we can say in touch as much as we want.  Every other option was just too, too pricey.

I find the RingBritain service excellent for keeping in touch with friends and family overseas.No worries about running out of money either as it is automatically renewed as soon as the total goes below $5.
Great service,no problems with conections,clarity etc.Adding minutes is a breeze.Thank you.Ken and Judith Garside.Venice FL.
This is a great company.  Their rates are superb.  If it wasn't for RingBritain.com, I wouldn't be able to keep in touch with my elderly father and communicate with his caregivers etc.
Excellent service!! Great connection. I can finally call all my family in the UK without calling cards etc.  Ring Britain is easy to use.  Keep up the good service and excellent prices.
I have been using RingBritain for many years and it just works! Great hassle free easy to use service.

Review.Titre: I love RingBritain....I have been with…
Review.Contenu: I love RingBritain....I have been with them for many years. Very Happy. Staff are helpful and pleasant. I would recommend to anyone who needs international connection.

Review.Titre: Love this both sides of the Atlantic
Review.Contenu: Love this both sides of the Atlantic. Great savings all round and a fantastic way to keep in contact with people that don’t use apps or social media.

I love this service, easy to use. Very inexpensive so I can call my 97 year old dad and check on him regularly as I haven't been able to visit because of Covid. The other service I had before used to drop calls.Phone calls are clear. Give it 5 stars
works as intended..no connection issues..no interference..happy to use this service..thankk you
Ring Britain allows me to ring a family member, an aunt who’s 91 who does not have a mobile phone using  my mobile to her landline!
competitive rates , easy to recharge ,been using for quite a while now.

Review.Titre: Always connects and we are very…
Review.Contenu: Always connects and we are very satisfied with the ease to call and talk to our list of people in Britain,

Review.Titre: Great service for an unbeatable price
Review.Contenu: Great service for an unbeatable price! RingBritain is super easy to use, and the quality of the telephone call is outstanding. I recommend RingBritain for anyone here in the US!
Reliable, Affordable and easy to reload. I have been using Ring Britain for years and I’m very satisfied with this service. Thank you.
Perfect way to call family and businesses that cannot be reached via social media apps! I love this app!

Review.Titre: Punta Gorda to Concordreat airline. Great service. The best prices. We go from Punta Gorda to see our son in Charlotte. We go to Concord airport.
Review.Contenu: We travel up to Charlotte to see our son twice a year. Great airline , great price, most of the time it runs on time, the airports are smaller so no huge delays. It is like catching a bus . Love it. Love it. Have recommended to numerous people who have all been pleased. Keep up the good work.

Review.Titre: The automated means of connection has…
Review.Contenu: The automated means of connection has always been without fault which , in this day and age, is exceptional.Well done.

Review.Titre: I’m very satisfied with this service…
Review.Contenu: I’m very satisfied with this service and love how I can call using my mobile to call the UK unlimited minutes for such a great monthly rate!

Review.Contenu: I have used Ring Britain for years and never had any problems connecting. The local number we are given is good.

Review.Titre: We use the service quite regularly and…
Review.Contenu: We use the service quite regularly and appreciate the value and reliability.
Great phone service. Usually I can get through no problems. Only very occasionally the lines are busy. Good clarity.

Review.Titre: This is a great service I really enjoy…
Review.Contenu: This is a great service I really enjoy using it to call my friends and Great Britain and to replenish my account with a more money is very very simple and it done right online I really like ring Britain very much

Review.Titre: Great call rates and good quality audio…
Review.Contenu: Great call rates and good quality audio calls to landline and mobile.
Rates are fabulous.  I had used OneSuite.com for over 20 years.  Then their European rates skyrocketed!!!!!!Grateful to have found RingBritain

Review.Titre: Ring Britain is easy to use and…
Review.Contenu: Ring Britain is easy to use and cost-effective. Great for calling mobiles overseas. And I like that it just bills me as my minutes available get too low.

Review.Titre: RingBritain is a fantastic way to keep…
Review.Contenu: RingBritain is a fantastic way to keep in touch with family and friends in the U.K. It is inexpensive and reliable. I am so happy to be able to use it
Amazing service, never had a connection issue. Very easy to sign up and automate payments.I would highly recommend
Excellent service, fast and convenient. Topped up my balance instantly and kept in touch with my Mum x.

Review.Titre: A great service at a reasonable price
Review.Contenu: A great service at a reasonable price! I use it several times a week to call family in the UK and never been disappointed.

Review.Titre: Used Ring Britain for many years first…

Review.Titre: Easy to work with and reasonable

Review.Titre: I would highly recommend this service

Review.Titre: I use this service evert week to call…Calling UK.
Review.Contenu: I use this service evert week to call Scotland 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿 and so far it’s the easiest way to call and it’s a clear connection. Thank you for your service.
Easy to use service, great value, helps keep me connected to family at this difficult time.
I live in USA and use it twice a week to chat for an hour with my Mom in UK.  We really appreciate the availability of the service.
Greatness consists of that which we value most - reasonable cost combined with professional service professionally delivered.

Review.Titre: Easy to use and a reliable connection
Review.Contenu: Easy to use and a reliable connection. Useful to be sure that my call costs be kept low.

Great service, better reception and very helpful service. We use it all the time to call London.
Great service, Haven’t had a problem placing our call to Britian…
Been using Ring Britain for years now and it’s an excellent well priced service.  Well pleased
Easy and smooth, never run out of time. Best thing I ever did was to change from the previous service I was using to this one.

the line is reliable, user friendly and consisitent.Keep up your good work
